string.value: #bRalph the wanderer#k is sensing dark force around the Ghostship Area... I have to check him out once again.

#bRalph the wanderer#k believes that #rCapt. Latanica#k is back!!! He wanted me to enter the engine room once again, but he needs to find out that I am still in shape. I will have to prove to him that I have been training myself and am prepared.\n\n
I was finally able to prove to him that I am still prepared to enter the engine room. Now, Capt. Latanica is all mine!

Oh... It's you again... Thank you very much for helping all of us, sailors the last time. However, my dear Mapler, I can't stop having this weird feeling of mine... I sense the dark force again around the Ghost Ship Area... Would you like to check out the engine room again for me?

Great... Hey... I know that you are strong enough to defeat Capt. Latanica, but I really need to make sure that you are still in a good shape. Please provide me a evidence that you have been training hard.
Eliminate #b100 #o9420512#, #b100 #o9420511# and #b100 #o9420510##k and come back to me! Piece of cake, isn't it? Now, GO!
Guess you need to level up more to go into the Engine room right? I though so~
Are you able to prove to me that you can handle this?
Great! I am sorry I have underestimated you back there. Now, please take this #bWhite Essence#k with you and defeat the dark force! Good luck my friend!
No.... Way.... Have you been training? What happened to you? You were strong like a rock? But now, you are afraid of eliminating #b100 #o9420512#, #b100 #o9420511# and #b100 #o9420510##k??
